GSP33rams11pu:0: jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ brahma vedāntavedyam ity uktam / tad ayuktam; tad dhi na vākyapratipādyam /
GSP33rams11pu:3: śastraṃ yasya yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ, pramāṇam, tac chāstrayoniḥ; tasya bhāvaś śāstrayonitvam; tasmāt /
GSP33rams11pu:4_0: brahmajñānakāraṇatvāc chāstrasya tadyonitvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ / atyantātīndriyatvena pratyakṣādipramāṇāviṣayatayā
GSP33rams11pu:4_1: brahmaṇaś śāstraikapramāṇakatvād uktasvarūpaṃ brahma yato vā imāni bhūtānītyādivākyaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:7: aprāpte tu śāstram arthavat / kiṃ tarhi tatra pramāṇam?
GSP33rams11pu:8_0: na tāvatpratyakṣam / tad dhi dvividham indriyasaṃbhavaṃ yogasaṃbhavaṃ ceti / indriyasaṃbhavaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:8_1: ca bāhyasaṃbhavam āntarasaṃbhavaṃ ceti dvividhā / bāhyendriyāṇi vidyamānasannikarṣayogyasvaviṣayabodhajananānīti
GSP33rams11pu:10: bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanas tasya viśadāvabhāsatve 'pi pūrvānubhūtaviṣayasmṛtimātratvān na prāmāṇyam iti kutaḥ pratyakṣatā ?
GSP33rams11pu:11: tadatiriktaviṣayatve kāraṇābhāvāt; tathā sati tasya bhramarūpavatā / nāpy anumānaṃ viśeṣatodṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:12_0: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ vā / atīndriye vastuni saṃbandhāvadhāraṇavirahān na viśeṣatodṛṣṭam /
GSP33rams11pu:13_1: acetanārabdhaṃm jagataś caikacetanādhīnatvena vyāptam / sarvaṃ hi ghaṭādikāryaṃ tadupādānopakaraṇasaṃpradānaprayojanābhijñakartṛkaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:13_2: dṛṣṭam / acetanārabdham arogaṃ svaśarīram ekacetanādhīnaṃ ca / sāvayavatvena jagataḥ kāryatvam /
GSP33rams11pu:16: dṛṣṭānto hi sādhyavikalaḥ syāt / na hy arogaṃ svaśarīram ekacetanāyattotpattisthiti;
GSP33rams11pu:17: taccharīrasya bhoktṝṇāṃ bhāryādisarvacenatānām adṛṣṭajanyatvāt tadutpattisthityoḥ / kiṃ ca,
GSP33rams11pu:18_0: śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavetatārūpā sthitir avayavasaṃśleṣavyatirekeṇa na cetanam
GSP33rams11pu:18_1: apekṣate / prāṇanalakṣaṇā tu sthitiḥ pakṣatvābhimate kṣitijaladhimahīdharādau na
GSP33rams11pu:18_2: saṃbhavatīti pakṣasapakṣānugatām ekarūpāṃ sthitiṃ nopalabhāmahe / tad āyattapravṛttitvaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:21: ubhayavādisiddhānāṃ jīvānām eva lāghavena kartṛtvābhyupagamo yuktaḥ / na ca jīvānām upādānādyanabhijñatayā kartṛtvāsaṃbhavaḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:23: yathedānīṃ pṛthivyādayo yāgādayaś ca pratyakṣam īkṣyante / upakaraṇabhūtayāgādiśaktirūpāpūrvādiśabdavācyādṛṣṭasākṣātkārābhāve 'pi cetanānāṃ na kartṛtvānupapattiḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:24: tatsākṣātkārānapekṣaṇāt kāryārambhasya / bhaktimatsākṣātkāra eva hi kāryārambhopayogī;
GSP33rams11pu:26: na sākṣātkāraḥ / na hi kulālādayaḥ kāryopakaraṇabhūtadaṇḍacakrādivat tacchaktim api sākṣātkṛtya ghaṭamaṇikādikāryam ārabhante / iha tu cetanānām āgamāvagatayāgādiśaktiviśeṣāṇāṃ
GSP33rams11pu:29_0: yacchakyakriyaṃ śakyopādānādivijñānaṃ ca tad eva tadabhijñakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam / mahīmahīdharamahārṇavādi
GSP33rams11pu:29_1: tv aśakyakriyam aśakyopādānādivijñānaṃ ceti na cetanakartṛkam / ato ghaṭamaṇikādi
GSP33rams11pu:31_1: dṛṣṭam iti tathāvidham eva cetanaṃ kartāraṃ sādhayann ayaṃ kāryatvahetus siṣādhayiṣitapuruṣasārvajñyasarvāiśvaryādiviparītasādhanād
GSP33rams11pu:31_2: viruddhas syāt / na caitāvatā sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅgaḥ / liṅgini pramāṇāntaragocare
GSP33rams11pu:31_3: liṅgabalopasthāpitā viparītaviśeṣās tatpramāṇapratihatagatayo nivartante / iha tu
GSP33rams11pu:32: nivartakapramāṇābhāvāt tathaivāvatiṣṭhante / ata āgamād ṛte katham īśvaras setsyati ?
GSP33rams11pu:33: atrāhuḥ / sāvayavatvād eva jagataḥ kāryatvaṃ na pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate / bhavanti ca prayogāḥ vivādādhyāsitaṃ bhūbhūdharādi kāryam,
GSP33rams11pu:39_0: ghaṭavat iti / sāvayaveṣu dravyeṣu idam eva kriyate netarad iti kāryatvasya niyāmakaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:40_0: kāryatvenānumate 'pi viṣaye jñānaśaktī kāryānumeye ity anyatrāpi sāvayavatvādinā
GSP33rams11pu:40_1: kāryatvaṃ jñātam iti te ca pratipanne eveti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ / tathā hi ghaṭamaṇikādiṣu
GSP33rams11pu:41_0: vicitrasanniveśaṃ narendrabhavanam ālokya avayavasanniveṣaviśeṣeṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:41_1: niścitya tadānīm eva kartus tajjñānaśaktivaicitryam anuminoti / atas tanubhuvanādeḥ
GSP33rams11pu:41_2: kāryatve siddhe sarvasākṣātkāratannirmāṇādinipuṇaḥ kvacit puruṣaviśeṣas sidhyaty eva /
GSP33rams11pu:42_0: kiṃ ca sarvacetanānāṃ dharmādharmanimitte 'pi sukhaduḥkhopabhoge cetanānadhiṣṭhitayos
GSP33rams11pu:42_1: tayor acetanayoḥ phalahetutvānupapattes sarvakarmānuguṇasarvaphalapradānacaturaḥ kaścid āstheyaḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:43_2: śrotriyavetālānām anabhijñatāvijṛmbhitam / tata eva sukhādibhir vyabhicāravacanam
GSP33rams11pu:43_3: api tathaiva / na ca lāghavenobhayavādisaṃpratipannakṣetrajñānām eva īdṛśādhiṣṭhātṛtvakalpanaṃ yuktam;
GSP33rams11pu:44_1: kalpanā / na ca kṣetrajñavad īśvarasyāśaktiniścayo 'sti / ataḥ prāmāṇāntaro na tatsiddhyanupapattiḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:48_0: sapakṣe sahadṛṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāryasyāhetubhūtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ liṅginy aprāpteḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:48_1: etad uktaṃ bhavati / kenacit kiṃcit kriyamāṇaṃ svotpattaye kartus svanirmāṇasāmarthyaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:51: na hi kulālādiḥ kriyamāṇavyatiriktaṃ kim api na jānāti / nāpi katipayaviṣayam;
GSP33rams11pu:52: sarveṣu kartṛṣu tattadajñānāśaktyaniyamena sarveṣām ajñānādīnāṃ vyabhicārāt / ataḥ
GSP33rams11pu:53: kāryatvasyāsādhakānām anīśvaratvādīnāṃ liṅginy apratītir iti na viparītasādhanatvam /
GSP33rams11pu:54: kulālādīnāṃ daṇḍacakrādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīradvāreṇaiva dṛṣṭam iti jagadupādānopakaraṇādhiṣṭhānam īśvarasyāśarīrasyānupapannam iti cen na;
GSP33rams11pu:55: saṃkalpamātreṇaiva paraśarīragatabhūtavetālagaralādyapagamavināśadarśanāt / katham aśarīrasya parapravartanarūpas saṃkalpa iti cet;
GSP33rams11pu:57: śarīrasya saṃkalpahetutvābhāvāt / mana eva hi saṃkalpahetuḥ / tadabhyupagatam īśvare 'pi;
GSP33rams11pu:58: kāryatvenaiva jñānaśaktivan manaso 'pi prāptatvāt / mānasas saṃkalpas saśarīrasyaiva,
GSP33rams11pu:61_3: īśvaro 'numānenaiva siddhyati / ataḥ pramāṇāntarāvaseyatvād brahmaṇo naitadvākyaṃ
GSP33rams11pu:63_0: atyantabhinnayor eva mṛddravyakulālayor nimittopādānatvadarśanena ākāśāder niravayavadravyasya
GSP33rams11pu:63_1: kāryatvānupapattyā ca naikam eva brahma kṛtsnasya jagato nimittam upādānaṃ ca pratipādayituṃ śaknotīti //
GSP33rams11pu:64: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma janmādivākyaṃ bodhayaty eva / kutaḥ?
GSP33rams11pu:65: śāstraikapramāṇakatvād brahmaṇaḥ / yad uktaṃ sāvayavatvādinā kāryaṃ sarvaṃ jagat,
GSP33rams11pu:66: kāryaṃ ca taducitakartṛviśeṣapūrvakaṃ dṛṣṭam iti nikhilajagannirmāṇatadupādānopakaraṇavedanacaturaḥ kaścid anumeya iti;
GSP33rams11pu:68: mahīmahārṇavādīnāṃ kāryatve 'pi ekadaivaikenaiva nirmitā ity atra pramāṇābhāvāt / na caikasya ghaṭasyeva sarveṣām ekaṃ kāryatvam,
GSP33rams11pu:69_0: yenaikadaikaḥ kartā syāt / pṛthagbhūteṣu kāryeṣu kālabhedakartṛbhedadarśanena kartṛkālāikyaniyamādarśanāt /
GSP33rams11pu:69_1: na ca kṣetrajñānāṃ vicitrajagannirmāṇaśaktyā kāryatvabalena tadatiriktakalpanāyām
GSP33rams11pu:69_2: anekakalpanānupapatteś ca ekaḥ kartā bhavitum arhatīti;
GSP33rams11pu:72: tadatiriktātyantādṛṣṭapuruṣakalpanānupapatteḥ / na ca yugapat sarvotpattis sarvocchittiś ca pramāṇapadavīm adhirohataḥ; adarśanāt,
GSP33rams11pu:73_1: darśanānuguṇyena kalpanāyāṃ virodhābhāvāc ca / ato buddhimadekakartṛkatve sādhye
GSP33rams11pu:76_1: sārvajñyasarvaśaktiyuktasya kasyacid ekasya sādhakam idaṃ kāryatvaṃ kiṃ yugamadutpadyamānasarvavastugatam ?
GSP33rams11pu:79: anekakarṭrkatvasādhanād viruddhatā / atrāpy ekakarṭrkatvasādhane pratyakṣānumānavirodhaś śāstravirodhaś ca; kumbhakāro jāyate,
GSP33rams11pu:80_0: rathakāro jāyata ityādiśravaṇāt / api ca sarveṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ śarīrādīnāṃ ca sattvādiguṇakāryarūpasukhādyanvayadarśanena
GSP33rams11pu:80_1: sattvādimūlatvam avaśyāśrayaṇīyam / kāryavaicitryahetubhūtāḥ kāraṇagatā viśeṣās sattvādayaḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:82: puruṣasya ca tadyogaḥ karmamūlaḥ iti kāryaviśeṣārambhāyaiva jñānaśaktivat kartuḥ karmasaṃbandhaḥ kāryahetutvenaivāvaśyāśrayanīyaḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:83: jñānaśaktivaicitryasya ca karmamūlatvāt / icchāyāḥ kāryārambhahetutve 'pi viṣayaviśeṣaviśeṣitāyās tasyās sattvāimūlakatvena karmasaṃbandho 'varjanīyaḥ / ataḥ
GSP33rams11pu:85: na tadvilakṣaṇaḥ kaścid anumānāt sidhyati / bhavanti ca prayogāḥ tanubhuvanādi kṣetrajñakartṛkam,
GSP33rams11pu:91: tadvad eva / na ca kṣetrajñānāṃ svaśarīrādhiṣṭhāne vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33rams11pu:92: tatrāpy anādes sūkṣmaśarīrasta sadbhāvāt/ vimativiṣayaḥ kālo na lokaśūnyaḥ,
GSP33rams11pu:95: api ca, kim īśvaras saśarīro 'śarīro vā kāryaṃ karoti ?
GSP33rams11pu:97: aśarīrasya kartṛtvānupalabdheḥ / mānasāny api kāryāṇi saśarīrasyaiva bhavanti;
GSP33rams11pu:98: manaso nityatve 'pi aśarīreṣu mukteṣu tatkāryādarśanāt / nāpi saśarīraḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:101: sāvayavasya tasya nityatve jagato 'pi nityatvāvirodhād īśvarāsiddheḥ / nāpy anityam;
GSP33rams11pu:102: tadvyatiriktasya taccharīrahetos tadānīm abhāvāt / svayam eva hetur iti cen na;
GSP33rams11pu:104: anyena śarīreṇa saśarīra iti cen na; anavasthānāt /
GSP33rams11pu:106: aśarīratvād eva na savyāpāraḥ / nāpi nirvyāpāraḥ kāryaṃ karoti muktātmavat / kāryaṃ jagad icchāmātravyāpārakartṛkam ity ucyamāne pakṣasyāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvam,
GSP33rams11pu:109: yat tu nimittopādānayor aikyam ākāśāder niravayavadravyasya kāryatvaṃ cānupalabdham aśakyapratipādanam ity uktam,
GSP33rams11pu:110: tad apy aviruddham iti prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt,
GSP33rams11pu:111: na viyadaśruter ity atra pratipādayiṣyate / ataḥ pramāṇāntarāgocaratvena śāstraikaviṣayatvād yato vā imāni bhūtānīti vākyam uktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma pratipādayatīti siddham //1,1.3//
